name: chats
description:
Sometimes there is nothing nicer than having a chat with a close friend. This game focuses on the heartwarming feeling you get when you talk with someone about random things related to life and about looking back.

This short game is based off those chats I've had in my life and shows the feeling I get when in these moments.

This game revolves around a single conversation between 2 friends who are now in college, discussing about their memories. It mainly focuses on atmosphere and tries to show how these small conversations really bring out our true thoughts and true emotions. Hope you enjoy :)
